# Analyzing verb data

Use it:

```{julia}
#| warning: false
#| output: false
using Complutensian
verbdata = loadverbdata()
```

Find verb ids:

```{julia}
allverbs = verblist(verbdata)
```
```{julia}
gigno = "ls.n19570"
psgsequences = passagesforverb(gigno, verbdata)
```


```{julia}
verbcounts = countsbyverb(verbdata)

verbcounts[gigno]
```
